Class RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, FlowContext.Handler
public class RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler
extends Object
implements FlowContext.Handler

Refreshes ListWidget(s) on finish and/or on cancel.

Author:
Anton Kuzmin (anton.kuzmin@webmedia.ee)

Constructor Detail

RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler

public RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler(List lists)
Refreshes lists on finishing and/or cancelling a flow.

Parameters:
lists - ListWidgets to be refreshed.

RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler

public RefreshingListsFlowContextHandler(boolean handleCancel,
                                         boolean handleFinish,
                                         List lists)
Refreshes lists on finish and also on cancel if apropriate parameters are set to true.

Parameters:
handleCancel - if true, the lists will be refreshed on cancel.
handleFinish - if true, the lists will be refreshed on finish.
lists - ListWidgets to be refreshed.
